value.title: If Not AI, Then What? Exploring Investor Interests In 2024
value.excerpt: As 2024 approaches, the spotlight is on AI development and the growth of sectors like agtech, proptech, and healthtech. value.title: farm-ng raises Series A funding to scale Amiga robot and AI for small to midsize farms
value.excerpt: Since the first industrial revolution two centuries ago, workers have moved into cities, even as population growth has challenged farmers to be increasingly productive. Today, farm-ng said it has completed its Series A funding round, raising more than $10 million to further develop the Amiga robot for agriculture.

value.title: Kodiak Robotics unveils driverless semitruck slated to hit Texas highways in 2024
value.excerpt: Kodiak Robotics Inc. unveiled what it calls the world’s first driverless-ready semi-truck designed for scaled deployment at the Consumer Electronics Show in January 2024. The truck will run various driverless operations between Dallas and Houston starting in 2024, according to the company.

value.title: ABB Acquires AI-Based Navigation Startup
value.excerpt: ABB announced that it has acquired Swiss start-up Sevensense, a provider of AI-enabled 3D vision navigation technology for autonomous mobile robots (AMRs). Sevensense was founded in 2018 as a spin-off from Swiss technical University, ETH Zurich.

value.title: CES 2024: eYs3D's New Edge AI Chips Transforming Computer Vision for Robotics
value.excerpt: Set to launch its eCV series SoCs later in 2024, eYs3D is embracing its concept of "AI+" and expanding its offering from USB-based controllers to full-fledged, edge-based SoCs. Built around on-core CPUs with ARM-based Cortex M and Cortex A architectures, the series provides top efficiency and next-level processing power.
